name: Stuff (1Kirik3)
description:
Story:

Oleg was a very diligent and intelligent boy. He was an excellent student, but one day his life went down the drain. One day he received a phone call from the university telling him that he did not get a state-funded place. His parents were disappointed in him and threw him out of the apartment. But Oleg wasn't going to give up. He started looking for money to live on and that got him into the criminal business... 

Gameplay:

Try to survive. You must find syringe (The number on the map is limited ) and kill (or avoid) enemies to survive. Try to find the right object to pass to the next level (with new syringe)
